name: After Prayer Dhikr
description: Authentic remembrances to recite after completing the five daily prayers

dhikrs.title: Seeking Forgiveness After Prayer
dhikrs.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ (ثَلاَثاً) اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلاَمُ وَمِنْكَ السَّلاَمُ تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا الْجَلاَلِ وَالإِكْرَامِ
dhikrs.transliteration: Astaghfirullah (3 times), Allahumma antas-salamu wa minkas-salamu, tabarakta ya dhal-jalali wal-ikram
dhikrs.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah (3 times). O Allah, You are peace and from You comes peace. Blessed are You, O Owner of majesty and honor.
dhikrs.benefits: Seeking Allah's forgiveness after worship and acknowledging His perfection

dhikrs.title: Post-Prayer Tasbih, Tahmid, Takbir
dhikrs.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ (33) الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ (33) اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ (34)
dhikrs.translation: Glory be to Allah (33 times), All praise is due to Allah (33 times), Allah is the Greatest (34 times).
dhikrs.benefits: These dhikrs after prayer are more beloved to Allah than the world and all it contains

dhikrs.title: La ilaha illa Allah after Prayer
dhikrs.arabic: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
dhikrs.transliteration: La ilaha illa Allah wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer
dhikrs.translation: There is no deity except Allah, alone without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
dhikrs.benefits: Sins are forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea

dhikrs.title: Ayat al-Kursi After Prayer
dhikrs.arabic: اللَّهُ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لاَ تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلاَ نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الأَرْضِ
dhikrs.transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa huwal-hayyul-qayyoom la ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa la nawm, lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ard...
dhikrs.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep...
dhikrs.benefits: Nothing prevents entry into Paradise except death for whoever recites this after every prayer

dhikrs.title: Dua for Guidance and Provision
dhikrs.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
dhikrs.transliteration: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni 'ibadatik
dhikrs.translation: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You in the best manner.
dhikrs.benefits: The Prophet ﷺ advised Muadh to never leave this dua after every prayer
